Name: Post-Northridge welded steel moment connection other than RBS, beam one side, beam depth <= W27

GeneralInformation.Description: Costing is on a per bay basis.  Costing does not include fireproofing removal or reapplication cost.
GeneralInformation.Author: Greg Deierlein

DamageStates.Description: Local beam flange and web buckling.
DamageStates.RepairMeasures: The likely repair state is heat straightening of the buckled flanges and web.

DamageStates.Description: DS1 plus lateral-torsional distortion of beam in hinge region.
DamageStates.RepairMeasures: Repair will necessitate removal and replacement of distorted and or fractured portion of beam.

DamageStates.Description: Low-cycle fatigue fracture in buckled region of RBS.
DamageStates.RepairMeasures: Repair will necessitate removal and replacement of distorted and/or fractured portion of beam.
